metadata.title: Rocky Horror Picture Show, The
description: 'Absolute Treasures' is the expanded reissue of the soundtrack for the 40th anniversary of the 1975 cult musical film 'The Rocky Horror Picture Show' starring Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, and Meat Loaf. The album includes ALL songs from the film, on CD and vinyl, for the first time, including 'Planet Schmanet Janet,' 'Once In A While,' 'The Sword of Damocles,' and 'Planet Hot Dog'!
